"Bouncer": "Bouncer is a high-mobility Class that can fight at an advantage in the air. Its Class Skills also help it to cause Physical Down and Attribute Down, turning battles to its favor."

"\"Physical Decline\" is a Class Skill that makes it easier for Dual Blades PAs to inflict Physical Down, and \"Elemental Decline\" is a Class Skill that makes it easier for Jet Boots PAs to inflict Attribute Down.

They will be especially useful in battles against powerful boss enemies."
